transcript.title: STATEMENT BY THE PRIME MINISTER, THE HON P J KEATING MP VISIT TO AUSTRALIA BY CANADIAN PRIME MINISTER CHRETIEN
transcript.content:
TEL: MINI.. ER
PRIME MINISTER
STATEMENT BY TIE PRIME MINISTER, THE HON P J KEATING MP
VISIT TO AUSTRALIA BY CANADIAN PRIME MINISTER CHRETIEN
I am very pleased to announce that the Prime Minister of Canada, the
Rt Hon Jean Chretien will visit Australia as a guest of the Australian Government
from 14 to 16 November.
I warmly welcome this first visit to Australia by a Canadian Prime Minister in
years. Australia and Canada enjoy strong and close relations, which
Prime Minister Chretien's visit will reinforce.
I look forward to greeting Prime Minister Chretien and to discussing with him the
wide range of important issues and interests which our two governments have in
common. CANBERRA 9 November 1995 9. Nov. 95 2: 29 No. 00?
